title: Clone The MultiGov Repository
content: Download the [codebase](https://github.com/wormhole-foundation/multigov) and navigate to the appropriate folder (`evm` or `solana`).

title: Set Up Your Project
content: Install the required toolchain for your target network. For EVM, use Foundry (or similar); for Solana, use Anchor (or similar), Solana CLI, and Rust.

title: Configure Deployment Settings
content: Set environment variables such as RPC URLs, keypairs, and hub chain details in a `.env` file or Anchor config.

title: Deploy MultiGov Contracts or Programs
content: Use the provided scripts to deploy the hub (EVM only) and spoke components (EVM or Solana) to your selected networks.

title: Initialize Governance Configuration
content: Set voting parameters, authorities, and metadata. Use deployment scripts or governance proposals depending on your setup.
